TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class PlaybackState : Java.Lang.Object, Android.OS.IParcelable, IDisposable
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PlaybackState extends Java.Lang.Object implements class Android.OS.IParcelable, class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Playback state for a .

remarks.para: Playback state for a . This includes a state like , the current playback position, and the current control capabilities.

Docs.summary: Indicates this session supports the fast forward command.

remarks.para: Indicates this session supports the fast forward command.

Docs.summary: Indicates this session supports the rewind command.

remarks.para: Indicates this session supports the rewind command.

Docs.summary: Get the current actions available on this session.

remarks.para: Get the current actions available on this session. This should use a bitmask of the available actions.

Docs.summary: Indicates this session supports the seek to command.

remarks.para: Indicates this session supports the seek to command.

Docs.summary: Indicates this session supports the stop command.

remarks.para: Indicates this session supports the stop command.

Docs.summary: Get the id of the currently active item in the queue.

remarks.para: Get the id of the currently active item in the queue. If there is no queue or a queue is not supported by the session this will be .

Docs.summary: Get the current buffered position in ms.

remarks.para: Get the current buffered position in ms. This is the farthest playback point that can be reached from the current position using only buffered content.

Docs.summary: Get the list of custom actions.

remarks.para: Get the list of custom actions.

Docs.summary: To be added.
Get a user readable error message.

remarks.para: Get a user readable error message. This should be set when the state is .

Docs.summary: Get the elapsed real time at which position was last updated.

remarks.para: Get the elapsed real time at which position was last updated. If the position has never been set this will return 0;

Docs.summary: Use this value for the position to indicate the position is not known.

remarks.para: Use this value for the position to indicate the position is not known.

Docs.summary: Get the current playback speed as a multiple of normal playback.

remarks.para: Get the current playback speed as a multiple of normal playback. This should be negative when rewinding. A value of 1 means normal playback and 0 means paused.

Docs.summary: Get the current playback position in ms.

remarks.para: Get the current playback position in ms.

Docs.summary: Get the current state of playback.

remarks.para: Get the current state of playback. One of the following:

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.Session.PlaybackStateCode StateBuffering = (6)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.Session.PlaybackStateCode enum directly instead of this field.")

Docs.summary: State indicating this item is currently buffering and will begin playing when enough data has buffered.

remarks.para: State indicating this item is currently buffering and will begin playing when enough data has buffered.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.Session.PlaybackStateCode StateConnecting = (8)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.Session.PlaybackStateCode enum directly instead of this field.")

Docs.summary: State indicating the class doing playback is currently connecting to a new destination.

remarks.para: State indicating the class doing playback is currently connecting to a new destination. Depending on the implementation you may return to the previous state when the connection finishes or enter . If the connection failed should be used.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.Session.PlaybackStateCode StateError = (7)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.Session.PlaybackStateCode enum directly instead of this field.")

Docs.summary: State indicating this item is currently in an error state.

remarks.para: State indicating this item is currently in an error state. The error message should also be set when entering this state.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.Session.PlaybackStateCode StateFastForwarding = (4)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype Android.Media.Session.PlaybackStateCode StateNone = (0)

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This constant will be removed in the future version. Use Android.Media.Session.PlaybackStateCode enum directly instead of this field.")

Docs.summary: This is the default playback state and indicates that no media has been added yet, or the performer has been reset and has no content to play.

remarks.para: This is the default playback state and indicates that no media has been added yet, or the performer has been reset and has no content to play.

Docs.summary: This API supports the Mono for Android infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
Docs.value: A which provides the declaring type.

remarks.para: This property is used to control virtual vs. non virtual method dispatch against the underlying JNI object. When this property is equal to the declaring type, then virtual method invocation against the JNI object is performed; otherwise, we assume that the method was overridden by a derived type, and perform non-virtual methdo invocation.
